topic.title: How do we update our logos?

body.p: The merchant logo is used in various places on . We initially obtain the required logos as part of the onboarding process. However, if at any time the logos need to be updated, simply send us a request to do so via e-mail. The request should have the new image files attached. We only use the .PNG format and sizes 120x60, 88x31, or 300x100.
body.note: Once the update has been made in our system, it will appear on the site immediately.
